document_data.name: Duhlark's Glasstrike
document_data.mainbody: '''''Duhlark's glasstrike''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell turned a targeted creature or object into glass. When transforming objects, it turned up to {{SI|4|cu ft}} of it's volume into glass. The spell had no effect on enchanted or magical items. When the spell expired, the transformed creature or object returned to their normal state. If they suffered damaged while transformed, that damage was evident after the spell expired.

The reverse of this spell, called '''''Duhlark's glassremove''''', negated the effects of a previously cast ''glasstrike'' spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[spell focus|focus]], a piece of a mirror.
